choiceresponse.label: When do you need to update a link that points at a full course location?
choiceresponse.description: Select all that apply. See hint for example.

checkboxgroup.choice: When you offer a new run of your course.
When you move a unit within your course.
When you delete and recreate a unit.
When you edit a component within the unit.
When you delete all the components within a unit.

div.p: Links that point to a fully qualified URL are the most fragile. They include section and subsection locations, as well as the course run number.

demandhint.hint: An example of a fully-qualified course link is https://courses.edx.org/courses/course-v1:HarvardX+StudioAdv1+2T2019/courseware/52238be957514597a83d8b0f9a6eae70/5df4ead60bcb405b94ebd5eb337e3ebc/3 . (We mean that text itself is the example; don't try to follow the link.)
